data.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya Epilogue
data.detailed_description:
Note: This is the epilogue to Tatsuya's Main Story. For the best playthrough experience, we recommend having finished all three of Tatsuya's canon endings from his main story.

Fast forward two years to the future and see how life has changed for you and Tatsuya. While you've never been more in love, you're not quite as far along in the relationship as you'd hoped. After a romantic date though, your life changes forever.

Can an old threat bring promises of a new, brighter future?

Features

  • Three new chapters
  • A new outfit for Tatsuya
  • A new CG
  • A new achievement

How to Play

After purchasing the DLC, please go to Select a Story > Click on Tatsuya > Click on Epilogue in the top navigation menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Sound Card: Any

data.legal_notice:
• Gameplay videos need to have prior permission to be uploaded outside of Steam. Doing so without permission means your video might be at risk to be taken down. Email us at support@starmaidengames.com to request prior permission.
  • Screenshots are welcomed and encouraged, but please avoid showing any major plot moments.
